item.title: シェルスクリプトで Usage 表示
item.description: はじめに 簡易敵な Usage 表示 実装 #!/usr/bin/env bash #/ Usage: #/ awsome-script [-h | -help] <name> [<count>] #/ #/ Example #/ awsome-script foo #/ awsome-script foo 3 #/ set -e usage () { grep '^#/' < "$0" | cut -c4- exit 0 } if [ "$1" = "--help" ] || [ "$1" = "-h" ]; then usage fi NAME=$1 COUNT=${2:-0} echo "$NAME" "$COUNT"
